/.title: Avalanche Prediction Project
/.content:
![Mountain Sunset](images/mountain-sunset.jpg)

This is the knowledge vault for Group 3's AD470 Practicum at [North Seattle College.](https://northseattle.edu/programs/application-development/application-development-bachelor-applied-science-bas-degree) We are using meterological and topographical data collected from various sources to make projections on the likelihood of an [[notes/Avalanche|avalanche]] happening based on the given conditions.

> [!note] Todo
>
> These secttions should maybe get broken out into their own pages ("Concepts and Definitions", "CSV Datasets", etc.) so that the link graph makes more sense

[[notes/Tableau Test Note|Tableau Test Note]]

## Existing Capstone Project
We found the repo for [[notes/Drew Thayers Avalanche Prediction Capstone Project|Drew Thayers Avalanche Prediction Capstone Project]], which might be useful for seeing an existing example.

/notes/Avalanche.title: Avalanche
/notes/Avalanche.content: I don't have any information, but once I'm filled out, I'll have information about avalanches.

/notes/Drew-Thayers-Avalanche-Prediction.title: Drew Thayers Avalanche Prediction Capstone Project
/notes/Drew-Thayers-Avalanche-Prediction.content: [This capstone project](https://github.com/drewthayer/avalanche-prediction) from 2018 covers similar topics and could be useful as a reference.

/notes/Markdown-for-Obsidian.title: Markdown for Obsidian
/notes/Markdown-for-Obsidian.content:
[Here are the official docs](https://help.obsidian.md/Editing+and+formatting/Basic+formatting+syntax), and here's a quick reference wrapped in an example codeblock:

```markdown
# Header Text
## Subheader Text
### etc.

**bolded text** 
*italicized text*
***bold, italicized text***
~~strike-through text~~
==Highlighted Text==

[Link to an External page](https://google.com)
[[Link to a Vault Page]]
[[Link to a Vault Page|displayed with a different name]]

![[embedded-image-or-pdf-path.png]]

- list item
- another list item
- and another

`code snippets`
```

# Callouts
[Docs Page](https://help.obsidian.md/Editing+and+formatting/Callouts)

```markdown
> [!type]
> text for callout
```

>[!info]
>These look cool but are kind of annoying to use
